features: High-Quality Bidet Attachment for Toilet: The bidet attachment is made of environmentally friendly ABS material, a stainless steel T-valve, and a braided steel cold water hose. High-quality metal water inlet is more durable, and not easy to wear and tear, and water leakage.

Dual Nozzles Bidets for Existing Toilets: The non-electric bidet has dual nozzles with two spray modes: rear cleansing for men and women, and front cleansing for women's private parts. The button design is more convenient to use. Existing toilet bidets are more hygienic, gentler, and more environmentally friendly than toilet paper, and using them makes sustainable sense for the planet.

Hygiene Protection: The retractable nozzle automatically retracts behind the protective door after use. Self-cleaning function, cleaning the nozzle thoroughly, maximum protection, and easy maintenance, give you a double hygiene guarantee. The ergonomically designed bidet is only 0.2 inches thick, highly compatible with bidet toilet seat, and fits most toilets.

Adjustable Water Pressure: The water pressure can be adjusted with the easy-to-use control knob for ideal water flow, no need to adjust the water pressure every time you use it. Even the elderly and children can use it easily. The toilet bidet attachment allows users to have a comfortable and easy-to-use experience and enjoy an environmentally friendly and healthy life.

Easy and Quick Installation: Compatible with most toilets. Simply unscrew the toilet seat, then install the bidet attachment, and finally attach the toilet seat and tighten, easily fits into a standard two-piece toilet in minutes, and you're ready to go. Simple and detailed installation instructions for the bidet attachment are provided for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really as easy as they say
reviews.reviewText: I will say that at first I was skeptical regarding the use of this bidet. Even when I received it packaging seemed on the lower end. Once I took the unit out of the box I oxiodnsee the quality in design. I also happened to purchase a new toilet seat as well just to make it all feel new.Installation was easy. At first I didn't realize how tight everything needed to be since I had a small leak. Once I really got the nuts and the valves properly adjusted it worked like a charm.The water pressure is adjustable which is great for those who want to figure out their most comfortable setting and the buttons are fostty easy to understand and use. If you can note by looking at the piece that goes in the toilet and the switch board, it's very minimalist in design.No power needed and the anesthetic is very nice. I would say that this product is certainly worth a try especially foe the price point. Leaves you feeling clean and you actually save a bit more toilet paper in the long run.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is so great so easy to install took me 5 min to install. It’s powerful too! Careful if you have kids! Shot all the way to the shower. I like the adjustable pressure and the female wash vs butt wash. Great price for a simple and effective bidet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pretty easy to install, was leaking water from the hose a little at first so had to go back and tighten everything thoroughly but it stopped leaking after that, it definitely gets the job done and saves on buying so much tp, I've been using it for about 3 months. I'm a guy so I can't review the feminine sprayer function lol but the derriere bottom sprayer is top notch plus you can adjust the spray power with the +/- scroll on the side, from a light spray to a pretty powerful one, I set it to probably a 4 out of 10 on the spray level. Makes sense why it has such a high rating, 10/10 would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This does the job, install is pretty straight forward and easy to do. I’ve noticed that the “spray” button does get stuck from time to time and I have to get a little forceful with the off button. Other than that. Pressure is adjustable and good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value, Easy to install, seems like good enough construction
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this bidet attachment, and I am extremely impressed with its performance. Installation was a breeze, taking me only a few minutes with the clear instructions provided. The bidet offers a refreshing and hygienic cleansing experience, making me wonder how I ever lived without it.The adjustable water pressure settings allow for a customized and comfortable cleanse. The nozzle positioning is precise, ensuring accurate targeting and minimal mess. Plus, the self-cleaning feature is a real time-saver.Not only has this bidet attachment improved my personal hygiene, but it has also helped reduce toilet paper waste, making it an eco-friendly choice. It's a small investment for a significant upgrade in comfort and cleanliness. I highly recommend this bidet attachment to anyone looking to enhance their bathroom experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stupidy simple to install and use.
reviews.reviewText: Yup, now you can own your very own appliance once reserved for royalty and found in many upscale restaurants and hotels. I installed this bidet on my toilet and connected the supply lines within 20 minutes. As for functionality, there are basically only three modes of operation, feminine wash, posterior wash (as the name implies, a shower for your butt), and nozzle cleaning mode that flushes the lines and cleans the nozzles. Especially useful after a bad night at Taco Bell and you leave a mess in the bowl the next morning..There is also a pressure dial on the side of the control panel to adjust the amount of pressure output of the nozzles for all modes of operation. Set and forget to your comfort level, and adjustable for the comfort levels for your family members. Just a word of caution is in order. Unless you want a high pressure enema, I'd suggest not putting it set to MAX.The push button control panel is within easy reach and very intuitive. Enjoy that luxury only reserved for royalty and the rich with the simple push of a button, at a very affordable price.Hey guys! Want a tip? Just because the button says "feminine wash" on the controls (using icons for identification), just give that button a push anyways! No guts, no glory. Just like Charley did in the Wonkavator when Willy Wonka told him to push that red button because Wonka never did. You will certainly be in for a treat! LOLOverall, it is a very decent hygienic appliance that is super easy to install, affordable, and would make a great gift to give to your elderly friends or family members. Put one under the tree this Christmas. The receiver will love it. They got enough flat screen TVs anyways. Instead of giving them the gift of eye candy this year, give them the gift of butt candy. It makes going to the bathroom fun again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems to work well.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased as a gift. Now you can clean your dirty donkey. Installed easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised and no leaks
reviews.reviewText: Instructions were clear and straightforward. Unique to my situation is a plastic coupling that attaches to the toilet tank. If you have one of these, Skip the teflon tape on the t-pipe so that it attaches firmly.
Fácil de instalar. Se ve muy bien. Funciona muy bien. Me gusto.

reviews.reviewTitle: Worked as it should but Installation is a hassle
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used toilet seat bidets for along time across a couple of brands. Installation has been smooth but this recent bidet hose doesn’t fit the standard 1/2” piping in Singapore. Took us some time and effort to look for a converter (circled in red) to connect the hose. Otherwise it’s a good product.

con una semana de uso, y los botones se quedan trabados y no vuelve a cerrar el flujo de agua completamente y queda fugando, se intenta con otros botones pero igual se mantiene con flujo de agua, el mecanismo definitivamente altamente defectuoso
